data.title: Signals Intelligence (SIGINT) Systems
data.meta_description: L3Harris provides world-class signals intelligence (SIGINT) systems, using scaled SIGINT technology developed over the past 60 years and leveraging decades of investment and experience.
data.text:
L3Harris is an industry leading provider of full-spectrum SIGINT capability with its scalable family of system (FOS) solutions. Our FoS approach to SIGINT payloads allows us to offer capabilities across all domains to address communications intelligence (COMINT) and electronic intelligence (ELINT) requirements.

BlackRock™ COMINT SYSTEM

BlackRock offers a scalable SIGINT capability in small to large commercial off-the-shelf (COTS)-based footprints. Sized for three operators and up, the open architecture BlackRock system is fully scalable in terms of frequency range, number of parallel channels, and number of tuner assets.

Integrated on-board your platform for dedicated SIGINT and multi-INT configurations

Enables integration of larger systems

Supports multiple onboard and remote operators via satellite or line-of-sight communications

LEARN MORE: BlackRock™

Rio™ COMINT SYSTEM

Rio SIGINT capabilities meet rigorous mission requirements for small, manned and unmanned intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance platforms with the ability to intercept, locate, monitor and record communication signals using a common set of software applications.

Open architecture design supports third-party special signals applications

Scalable commercial-off-the-shelf (COTS) hardware

Configurable size, weight and power (SWaP) enables SIGINT applications on small, manned and unmanned airborne platforms

LEARN MORE: Rio™ Signals Intelligence System

Olympia ELINT SYSTEM

Olympia represents the latest L3Harris development in electronic intelligence (ELINT)/electronic support measures (ESM) systems technology and is an open architecture system that is largely designed around COTS hardware using industry standards for packaging and interfacing.

Provides complete radar detection, processing and geolocation solutions for situational awareness and threat warning

Latest L3Harris development in ELINT/ ESM systems technology

Open architecture system that is largely designed around commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) hardware using industry standards for packaging and interfacing.

LEARN MORE: Olympia System

NYFR ELINT SYSTEM

Nyquist Folding Receiver (NYFR) uses patented techniques to provide 100 percent probability of intercept. It operates as a stand-alone threat warning system or as a part of a comprehensive Olympia ELINT suite.

NYFR uses a patented process to digitize 15 GHz simultaneously and detect radar emitters

100 percent probability of detect

Cues threat warning indicators and full ELINT system for detailed collection and geolocation
